title: A question that I'm sure all of you can answer (will be pretty awesome)
content:
For my portfolio for college applications, I want to re-design a famous furniture/ modern home company. whether its a catalogs or buses, I want to design them all!  
So heres my question to all of you.  
Please list every possible companies that still exist that you know about.  
EX: Knoll, Gispen, etc.

Fanx!
author: Ken W
